full_text:
1 DETECTIVE 2: Okay.
2 
3 No I did not.
4 
5 DETECTIVE 2: But you remember that that was the summer you wanted to go to Maine.
6 
7 
8 Uh huh.
9 DETECTIVE: So that was two summers ago when you were sixteen years of age.
10 
11 
12 Yes.
13 
14 FRIEND: You were, you were able to drive by yourself, so you had to be at least sixteen.
15 
16 
17 Yeah, so I was sixteen.
18 
19 DETECTIVE 2: Okay. Um, when you, the first time you went, when he masturbated, did you see?
20 
21 
22 [giggles]
23 DETECTIVE: His member?
24 
25 
26 Oh, I thought you were going to ask me if I saw, like, his come.
27 
28 DETECTIVE 2: No.
29 
30 I saw all of the above.
31 
32 DETECTIVE 2: You saw him naked, fully naked? Fully naked?
33 
34 //Yeah, a hundred percent naked. He had a towel on for some of it, but that doesn’t mean anything, like, he was naked.
35 
36 
37 DETECTIVE: He took off the towel?
38 
39 I saw everything, yeah.
40 
41 DETECTIVE: Okay. Do you know the difference between circumcised and uncircumcised? Yeah. Would you say…
42 
43 
44 He’s uncircumcised.
45 
46 DETECTIVE: Uncircumcised?
Defense Transcript 07/26/17 9 October 11, 2005 PBPD & Page 2348 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00032661
